title: ASUS VivoBook K15 OLED (2021) Core i3 11th Gen - (8 GB/256 GB SSD/Windows 10 Home) K513EA-L302TS Thin and Light Laptop  (15.6 inch, Indie Black, 1.80 kg, With MS Office)

product_specification.Sales Package: Laptop, Power Adaptor, User Guide, Warranty Documents
product_specification.USB Port: 1 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, 1 x USB 3.2 Gen
product_specification.Screen Type: Full HD LED Backlit OLED Glossy Display (16:9, 220nits Brightness, DCI-P3: 100%, Color Gamut, 85% Screen-to-body Ratio)

product_description.Add a Touch of Flair: Add a pop of colour to your daily life with the bright colours and visuals of this laptop. The presence of the colour-blocking Enter key adds a touch of flair to your computing. Powered by an Intel Core Processor, this laptop is stylish and powerful.
product_description.Unique Enter Key: The special colour-block Enter key of this laptop stands out from the rest and makes for an interesting centrepiece during long work hours.
product_description.Expansive Display: The thin-bezel design of this laptop’s NanoEdge display helps provide an expansive viewing experience. The thin bezel ensures that you get a large screen encased in a narrow frame, making for immersive viewing.
product_description.Stay Productive: Powered by an Intel Core Processor with up to 8 GB of RAM, this laptop is sufficiently equipped to handle your daily operations. It also comes with up to 512 GB of SSD storage to safely store and recall all your documents, media, and other files.
product_description.Get a Power Boost: This laptop comes with ASUS Intelligent Performance Technology (AIPT) to efficiently manage the power and cooling of the device. It makes use of ASUS exclusive algorithms that combine with five to nine smart sensors, an IceBlade fan design, and a power supply to increase the performance and stability of the system. This results in improved battery life and a quiet, cool laptop. You can use AIPT to ensure that your laptop stays in its high-performance mode all day.

review:
Thanks to asus ,this is a very nice laptop.It's display is awesome.No confuse you will impressed by this awesome oled display.Battery backup is enough to use (apprx. 6-8 hr of normal use,browsing..).It comes with harman kardan dts sound ,which is loud and give a new experience.build quality also nice.I purchased i3 processor but it also very powerful,
I purchased i3 processor at 46k but, if its cost would be 50k then also i will give it 5 star.No exception this is the best laptop about 50k at this time.
Go for it !

Pros - 1) Bright oled display as there is no backlight it reduces eye strain
2) adequate total 4 usb ports, soft keyboard
3)get asus power manager from windows store and keep settings at 60 percentage to reduce number of battery charge discharge cycle
4) good for web browsing with tab sudpender extension i can open upto 150 tabs.
5) excellent value for money as last year 15.6 inch oled laptop is to cost more than 1 lakh.
6)good n loud dts sound with stereo mix and enhancement. I use voicemeter banana to drive multiple external speakers.
7) very fast usb 3.0 copy from external pocket hdd
8)fast boot up time n fast fingerprint sensor and fast hibernate.
9)soon windows 11 drivers will be released by asus
10) oled saver, pixel shift n refresh can be configured from myasus app
11) battery drain is less, core i3 11 gen is same performance as core i7 8th generation i m using for office laptop

Cons- no speed control of cpu in battery power plan i use granola power manager for the same
Not able to go to bios inspite of pressing f1 n f2 furing startup
16gb memory model should be available for core i3.
Not able to connect external 4k display using usb type c port adapter..need to use hdmi port.

This laptop is insane. its single core cinebench r23 score is higher than some very high end cpu's (1200) because of high clock speed. Display is super bright and speakee is super loud.Battery performance is also decent, i saw a movie of 3 hour duration with 80 percent brightness and using bluetooth earphone baterry dropped only 30 percent. so i guess i would get atleast 6-8 hour battery backup also it charges 100 percent under 1.5 hours. wifi 6 and Bluetooth 5 works just fine. my asus is very helpful.

Pros- Powerful cpu, Gorgeous display, loud speaker, nice battery, good built , fast fingerprint scanner , fast charging, bezzels are small
cons- only issue is heating because of high cpu speed which you can control using throttlestop and disable turbo so your cpu won't go beyond 3 Ghz which will reduce temperature and save your battery as well.
Note- dont judge display with the image i have provided.

Amazing laptop , I'm just awestruck seeing the oled display 🤩 , smooth performance , design is perfect & I'll update abt the battery backup after using for some days . Once again , display is just alluring .

Awesome product 💯 Bought it after lot of research and I am happy that i chose a best laptop in this price range❤️ At first i had a doubt before buying while seeing reviews about glitches on screen but nothing like that. I am using it since a week, it is working fine and oled screen is fabulous. If you want it then go for it.
Worth every penny, also there is an extra slot for hdd, which is a big thumps up. Best laptop that you can buy under Rs.50k hands down.
Gorgeous screen..premium look...MS office...got W11 updated on same day. Got it at a very good price..Thank you ASUS ..thank you flipkart
Thanks ASUS and Flipkart for this amazing laptop.. 🤗🤗very nice and awesome... Must buy 🥰.. In this range this laptop worth the money.. good for students and professionals also..

Writing this after using for almost one week....the best laptop under 50000.... Display is obviously the show topper 💕 performance is also amazing 😍 if you're looking for a laptop with best display and day to day work performance blindly go for it 💕💕

if you are looking for a display then this is the perfect laptop for you to buy..
elegant design with it's premium finishing..
Oled display with great colors
hdd kit available in the package
for office work it's perfect and for media streaming it's more than perfect 😍😍
just love this laptop
i purchase black color.. for me the backlight keyboard is very good .. three level brightness which will provide you a great experience..
performance is very good but not for heavy gaming
battery is great but not that much great.. in battery saver mode you can get 3-4 hours but with performance mode you'll get around 2-2.5 hours
fast charging available so no problem
a must must buy deal from asus 😍😍

Asus did it right!!

I am writing this review after using this boy for a month.

Lets start with Display 😍:: Amoled display with true to life enhancing technology will blow your mind..Dont worry about any pixel burning issues.It has the inbuilt functionality like pixel shift and pixel refresh to optimise the picture quality.
Blue light emission control is a bonus.

Battery:: You will get around around 4 hrs in general 🥲

Performance:: Intel i3 11 gen will handle most of the daytoday task..i haven't encounter any issues in running multiple applications at a time. I have seen that it can handle 1080 seamless edit in premier.Task first capability will helps in prioritise network bandwidth depending upon the task u execute like multimedia streaming, productivity ect.

Nvme helps in fast bootup and fingerprint is pretty nice.
Harman Kardin integrated speakers are really impressive.
I can talk about this boy for hrs 😄

Long story short..Its so good..glad i have made a right choice.

Thankyou Flipkart for the quick and safe delivery !!

Awesome product from ASUS. Perfect deal for the non-gamers. Outstanding form factor with brilliant display. This is my second ASUS laptop and I am living with it. Both silver and black color seems elegant and I go with black. Initial impression is grand and let see how it performs with time. Absolutely recommend.

Delivered within 2 days..... Prompt and nice delivery...

just one con of this laptop is that the battery drains quite fast than usual..that is 3 -4 hours approx..
But I'm in love with the display and the overall performance 🥰

it's very useful laptop for students, I'm a medical student and my lots of stuff about ppt, pdf, books and net surfing. for all that it's perfect fit and in free time watching movies web series it's display was amazing the brightness couliu composition are beyond price, i haven't tried games yet

The major positive with this laptop was its display, You will never disappointment with its display, if you need a laptop for entertainment purpose just close your eyes and buy it and you can do casual office work if you need performance go for i5 variant, you can get 5 hours of screen on time while watching movies , and the built quality was good at its price, verdict - if you consume lot of ott apps like netflix, prime video, hotstar just go with it.... the best display in its class nothing can come close...
Best leptop and best body best display overall best product

Am giving review after one month of usage

My touch got problem from beginning guys if have the same problem replace immediately.

I got this prob from beginning and after the complaint to the asus they said driver prob and to update I saw updates and updated everything done, after that also the same problem exists after the one hour usage or sometimes from starting the touch pad won't work properly the mouse pointer will dance up and down also from the centre of the touch pad it won't work.
It worried me lot in this updation i thought the problem is solved but not solved so the replacement date crossed. After that again i made a compliant they authorised to service center they came to my site and changed my touch pad, after the I also the problem remains same but this time touchpad little okay because it worked in centre but the mouse pointer dancing prob and slow moving sometimes the pointer won't move even the same problem.
Again I made complaint and asked for replacement they are refusing to do that they said they will change any parts in the laptop but not replacement.
Am worried lot because I brought this lap for the purpose of work and now am spending time to customer care.
This is the only problem with my lap I don't know this problem is for everyone but it came for me.
Other things were awsome in this laptop.

If the customer care replaced my laptop I will be happy.

Most of our fellow members have given great detailed reviews and I can't add anything to it. However would like to try and help if you still are on the verge of decision making.
So, if you love a great crystal clear bright display, spend lot of time binge watching movies or series and are ok to spend some extra bucks, this laptop is for you. Just go for it! You will not regret. It may be a tad slower (boot up) when compared to similar configuration models but makes up more than enough for it with its display.

Only challenge I faced was to upgrade to win11, had to do a clean install even though this laptop meets all the requirements.
Also, I got a cracked display in the box so had to get a replacement. So be careful when unboxing.
Hope this helps.

answers: A:beat laptop for coding and gaming also

A:The lid is metallic...the body is plastic. However,I found that the build quality is good enough.
A:Yes. It can be expanded. Keep in mind, 4gb of ram is built in. So I added 16gb ram single stick. Now I got 20gb ram.. Works fine for me
